item.description:
What's New

  • Codex Usage Probes — Automatic background refresh when data goes stale, with 24-hour budgets and cleanup controls
  • Analytics Flip Cards — Click any chart to reveal sparklines, agent breakdowns, and insights
  • Improved Theming — Analytics and Git Inspector windows respond instantly to appearance changes
  • Better Session Tracking — Stable session IDs fix analytics metrics for Claude and Gemini
